file_content.text: Begin playback. Authorization Cipher Nine.
Cipher. This is infiltration operative Bax Kholer. I've assembled a list of prisoners with the skills to breach Megasecurity Ward 23.
This is Kanjon Slyke: assassin and escape artist. His brother died breaking into the ward some years ago.
Slyke can reconstruct and reassess his brother's plan. He hates authority figures, Imperials included.
Next, Chaney Barrow: slicer and computer expert. Former top saboteur for the Exchange. Motivated by greed and known to nurse a grudge.
Ohta: ex-mercenary and bounty hunter. Cast out of the Mandalorians for dishonorable conduct. He'll provide support and demolitions.
Lastly, Paarkos: No information on his crimes, but he's an alien tracker whose species sees through walls--handy to have around traps.
These people are volatile and extremely dangerous. Present yourself as a fellow inmate--do not reveal your allegiance.
Burly men and touchy alien freaks. It's like running with the old gang.
Somehow, I don't think this group will be together long.
Enjoy it while it lasts.
Like I said.
We're releasing a dark swarm upon this world. These people will be our responsibility.
They won't cause any problems. I won't let them.
We'll handle it.
I've never met a career criminal before. It's a little terrifying, but I'm kind of looking forward to this.
You'll meet a lot more in this job. It's how I got my start.
Consider it a lesson.
The career criminal is as predictable and insufferable as a small child. I hope you're a stern parent.
I can keep a few gangsters under control.
I'll handle the criminals.
Of course. I'll watch your back.
Resume playback.
Let's hear the rest.
They'll kill each other if we don't kill them first.
This looks like a disaster.
You'll use explosives to free the prisoners. Tag each prison cell with a blasting cap, then head to the Republic security center.
Use the security consoles to disable any fail-safes and make contact with the prisoners. You can detonate the blasting caps remotely.
Maps and safe house coordinates are attached. You're on your own now.
